page.title: 18OULTON HEATH WILDLIFE
page.content: The hedgerows are made up of Hawthorn, Holly Sycamore, Oak, Bramble and Briar etc. There are wild{flowers}to be seen including Buttercups, Bluebells, Clover Daisy, Dandelion, Fern, Willow Herb, Fox Glove, Celandine, Thistle, Nettle, Coltsfoot, Dock, Chickweed, Hogweed, Ragged Robin, also Bilberries. { Birds}such as Blackbird, Thrush, Sparrow, Starling, Jackdaw, Crow, Rook, Jay, Magpie, Owl, Nightjar, Marsh Tit, Tom Tit, Long Tailed Tit, Willow Warbler, Kingfisher, Chaffinch, Wagtail, Yellow Hammer, Wren, Wood Pigeon etc. { Fish}_ Stickleback and trout. { Animals}_ Rabbits, Hares, Foxes, Badgers, Moles, Weasels, Stoats, Field Mice, Grey Squirrels.
